archimate:Capability.name: Material setup correctly on all locations
archimate:Capability.documentation:
From: Brabu Yoganathan <bryaa@vestas.com> Subject: RE: Rye Park Additional tooling
HI Andrew,
Refer below for the contact points for the Material Master changes.
1. For Basic data (Mainly Traceability or Windchill dependent fields) - VIVEG 2. Plant extension and enrichment - ISWYE 3. For Finance MDM (Material Master Accounting and Costing)- SSC Costing and Inventory (Shared Mailbox) CostingandInventory@vestas.com Thank you,
Regards, Brabu
